sentences.sentence: The purpose of the thesis is to utilize UML to improve GIS figure modeling and apply to figure modeling course with GIS linear data simplifying and automatic cartographic generalization.
sentences.translation: 本文的目的是利用UML改进GIS图形建模，并运用于对自动制图综合和GIS线状数据的简化的图形建模过程。

sentences.sentence: The study on automated cartographic generalization has little breakthrough due to the lack of depth of generalization knowledge gained nowadays.
sentences.translation: 自动制图综合的研究长期以来未能取得突破性进展，原因之一是人们对制图综合的知识处理的深度不够。

sentences.sentence: Can utilize the geographical data of foundation in existing GIS database based on single scale, produce mult-scale data synthetically through automatic cartographic generalization.
sentences.translation: 可以利用已有的基于单一比例尺的GIS数据库中的基础地理数据，通过自动制图综合生成多比例尺数据。
